title: Stripe | L2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B. TECH (TIER 1, non-CS/IT)
Years of Experience at time of offer: ~4 YOE
Profile: Backend
Date of the Offer: H2 2023.
Company: Stripe
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L2)
Location: Bangalore (Hybrid)
Base: 50L
Stock bonus: $40K/33L per annum
Bonus: 5L
Joining Bonus: 7.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 50 + 5 + 7.5L + 33L = 95.5L for the first year (including PF and joining bonus)
Benefits: Standard Stripe benefits
salaryTotal: : 50 + 5 + 7.5l + 33l = 95.5l For The First Year (including Pf And Joining Bonus)

title: Cohesity | MTS 2 | Offer
content:
Education: B.Tech CS
Years of Experience: 2.8
Company: Cohesity
Title/Level: MTS-2
Location: Bangalore/Remote (Choice) But they have mentioned Bangalore in offer letter.
Base Salary: 32 LPA
Stock bonus: 2600 units / 3 years
Annual Bonus: 7.5%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 34.4 LPA + 16 LPA worth RSUs (I am taking the price to be 20$) HR claimed it as 30$
Current CTC: 23.7 LPA + 15 LPA stocks per year (2 years left)

I want an opinion on if I should switch to cohesity or not. I am liking the work in my current company and I have an appraisal due in 2 months. Leaving that aside what would be the general suggestion.
salaryTotal: : ~ 34.4 Lpa + 16 Lpa Worth Rsus (i Am Taking The Price To Be 20$) Hr Claimed It As 30$
